mapper.sql: id, counter_id, cntr_no, file_name, template_url, describes, cartons, status, user_id, user_name, create_time
mapper.select: select t.id,t.counter_id,t.cntr_no,t.file_name,t.template_url,t.describes,t.cartons,t.status,t.user_id,t.user_name,t.create_time, t2.id billId, t2.order_id billNo from counter_list_info t left join ocean_counter t1 on t1.id = t.counter_id left join ocean_bill t2 on t2.id = t1.ob_id where t.id = #{id}
select t.id,t.b_id,t.b_name,t.bill_id,t.bill_no,t.case_id,t.carton_no,t.create_time,t.order_no from counter_case_info t where t.b_id = #{b_id}
select t.id,t.counter_id,t.cntr_no,t.file_name,t.template_url,t.describes,t.cartons,t.status,t.user_id,t.user_name,t.create_time from counter_list_info t where t.counter_id = #{counterId}
select count(*) total from counter_case_info where b_id=#{b_id}

select t.id listInfoId, t1.id counterId,t1.cabinet_code,t1.cntr_no,DATE_FORMAT(t1.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') create_time, t2.id billId,t2.order_id billNo,DATE_FORMAT(t2.sail_time, '%Y-%m-%d') sail_time from counter_list_info t join ocean_counter t1 on t1.id = t.counter_id join ocean_bill t2 on t2.id = t1.ob_id where 1=1 and t.id = 26
